text.config.dragonhelper.title: DragonHelper Config
text.config.dragonhelper.option.messages: Hides the dragon item drop messages for other players
Hides the summoning eye placement messages
Hides the loot number and magic find text
Hides the 'Hey! Sorry, but you can't PvP here.' message
text.config.dragonhelper.option.autosell: Automatically runs the /sell command during the auto-sell
Automatically runs the /specialsell command during the auto-sell
Automatically sells summoning eyes during the auto-sell
Frequency, in seconds, to run the auto-sell commands
text.config.dragonhelper.option.notifica: Notifies you with a large title text when a superior dragon spawns
Notifies you with a large title text when an infernal dragon spawns
Notifies you with a large title text when the endstone protector spawns
text.config.dragonhelper.option.ui.zealo: Shows a Zealot kill counter on your screen
text.config.dragonhelper.option.ui.drago: Shows a dragon kill counter on your screen
text.config.dragonhelper.option.ui.endst: Shows an endstone protector kill counter on your screen
Shows the time (in seconds) until the next endstone protector spawn
text.config.dragonhelper.option.ui.rngMe: Shows your current RNG meter experience
text.config.dragonhelper.option.ui.zombi: Shows your current zombie slayer level progress
key.dragonhelper.configScreen: Edit the UI layout for DragonHelper!
